oyun deyil adeta bir sanat eseri walve basmış gene parayı grafikler mükemmel canlancak gibi source motorunun haffiliğiyle mükemmel optimize edilmiş en patates bilgisayarlarda bile en yüksek kalitede hiç kasmadan oynayabiliyorsunuz tabi bazı sahneler hariç sonu mükemmel başı mükemmel hikaye zaten süper herhangi bir altenatifi yok yani bence bitirmeyin uzun uzun oynayın her yeri herşeyi inceleyin az karakterle çok şey anlatmışlar hikaye akıcı konuşmaları geçmek istemiyorsunuz az ve öz anlatılmış konuşmalar varken oyunu bırakıp dinliyorsunuz eğer puzzle oyunlarını seviyorsanız mükemmel hikaye sevenlere de öyle ama aksiyon isterim bam güm adam öldürürüm diyorsananız pek tavsiye edemem ama yinede bi bakın derim

夏促打包入手
接着1的剧情，跌宕起伏各种反转，补充完整了主角，boss还有光圈科技的相关故事背景，当然画面也更具质感。
游戏性方面加入了几种新道具，什么光桥、光柱传送带、弹射板、三种凝胶...[spoiler]还有一个智障话唠球在疯狂bb[/spoiler]更加丰富好玩了。[spoiler]那个手持传送器居然能在月亮上开门，功率得有多大！！！！[/spoiler]
还是那句话，喜欢动脑手也不残的同学一定要来玩玩哈~
[spoiler]好希望有个小伙伴陪我一起玩双人模式啊啊啊啊啊[/spoiler]

Gra majstersztyk i czekam na 3 część tak samo jak na Half-life ;D[/b]

I didn't expect that this series will be that great, and i was wrong. Now portal is one of my fav franchise. Great level design, excellent plot and story, and a total improvement from portal 1. It's so polished now. Well what i'm saying is... it's worth it a lot. I'll reccomend you play potal 1 first tho, and of course half life. Bcs they shared the same Universe

i played the coop with a friend that never played any portal before in his life...
10/10 would do again

Portal 2, in my opinion, is the only great game Valve has ever created. After being underwhelmed by the Half-Life and Left 4 Dead franchises, Portal 2 was a breath of fresh air. Between the decent graphics, phenomenal puzzle design, cooperative campaign, and overall game length, this game is one I can recommend during a sale.

Simplemente hermoso: la jugabilidad, la historia, los personajes, los gráficos, su final sencillamente espectacular que deja con con una sensación de querer jugarlo más, todo es simplemente una verdadera obra de arte, juego recomendadisimo.

The perfect sequel to a game that I didn't think could get better. New characters, lore, puzzles, and cinematics make for a experience I wish I could relive again. Now if only we could get Valve to learn how to count to three...
10/10 in my top 3 best games

Ich würde jeden empfehlen, erst den Ersten teil zu spielen, wenn man ihn noch nicht gespielt hat, da sich die Story in zweiten teil fortsetzt.

+ Coole, nicht zu schwere oder zu leichte Rätsel
+ Co op mode
+ weitere Maps lassen sich in Workshop runterladen
+ Läuft so gut wie auf jeden Pc flüssig

- Framerateinbrüche
- Viele Ladebildschirme

Ingesamt hatte ich sehr viel spaß, und würde mich über einen dritten teil freuen.

review 9/10

FPS解密+剧情流，一个又一个谜题引人入胜，过关之余又可以在对话中逐渐深入剧情，多年前的作品今天玩来依然令人回味无穷，谜题有难度但也不是很难，只要细心耐心，大多数玩家都可以解决里面90%的关卡（实在想不到看看攻略就好），而每解决一关却能给人带来很大的成就感，剧情的不断深入更是让我这种小学生不断惊呼（真的吗？？）
不太会写评测的我就直接吹爆吧，画面科技感十足，关卡设计和一个个新道具的加入趣味丰富，解密时稍显孤独的氛围令人沉浸，
BGM恰到好处，当通关后ED动画在眼前滚动时，确实有点感动！！
双人游戏就比较欢乐了，但是。。好友啊。。都没来一起玩
Игра супер, но к концу уже оухли мозги.
UNA HERMOSURA ESTE JUEGO Y ME SIGUE GUSTANDO RECOMENDADISIMO :D

豐富的劇情 需要動腦的關卡 好聽的片尾曲
即使2018年了還是可以入手的好玩遊戲
